rules_text:
Skulk, haste
[i]Costly[/i] – You must spend mana only produced by Treasures to cast Cath, Master Theif.
[i]Master Thief[/i] – Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and draw a card.
[i]Take Everything[/i] – Whenever a card is put into an opponents graveyard, you make sacrifice a Treasure. If you do, exile that card. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled and may spend mana as though it was any color to cast it.
